summary: This document is a series of photo sheets from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, documenting a possible suicide attempt by inmate Jeffrey Epstein on July 23, 2019, at 1:27 AM in the Special Housing Unit. The photos were taken by a Lieutenant at 1:45 AM.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate who was the subject of a possible suicide attempt report at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: Possible Suicide Attempt by Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: A possible suicide attempt involving inmate Jeffrey Epstein was reported at 1:27 AM in the Special Housing Unit of the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, N.Y.
Special Housing Unit, Metropolitan Correctional Center
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was involved in a reported 'Possible Suicide Attempt' on July 23, 2019, at 1:27 AM.
The incident occurred in the Special Housing Unit of the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
Photographs of the incident scene were taken by a Lieutenant at 1:45 AM on the same day.
